planSelectionPO.hintText:
Max. 20 characters
Appoint a trustee if your beneficiary is a minor or lacks legal capacity and doesn't live in Quebec. If your beneficiary is a minor who lives in Quebec, death benefits will be paid to your beneficiary’s tutor (generally the parents) unless a trust for the minor exists. If a formal trust exists, don't complete this section. Consider getting legal advice before appointing a trustee.
In Quebec, if your spouse (married or civil union) is a beneficiary, you can't remove them without their permission unless you select the revocable checkbox below.
If you’re adding more beneficiaries, make sure the total adds up to 100%.
Max. 60 characters>

contingentBeneficiaryPO.contingentBeneficiaryDescription: In case all your primary beneficiaries die before you, choose who you'd like to receive your savings instead of them when you die.
contingentBeneficiaryPO.beneficiariesDeleteQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete TestContingent Testsample?

contingentBeneficiariesAdd.expected: The trustee and the beneficiary can't be the same person.

contingentBeneficiaryPO.addContingentBeneficiaryHintLabel: All fields are required unless labelled as optional.
contingentBeneficiaryPO.contingentTypeLabel: What type of beneficiary do you want to add?
contingentBeneficiaryPO.personDropDownQuestion: What’s this person’s relationship to you?

contingentFirstNameInvalid.initial: Enter a valid first name that contains only letters, hyphens, spaces, apostrophes, brackets and periods.

contingentLastNameInvalid.initial: Enter a valid last name that contains only letters, hyphens, spaces, apostrophes, brackets and periods.

contingentAllocation.initial: What percentage do you want to allocate to this beneficiary?

contingentAllocationInvalid.initial: Enter a valid percentage between 1 and 100.

contingentBeneficiaryPO.contingentAllocationError: Enter the percentage you'd like to allocate to this beneficiary.
contingentBeneficiaryPO.beneficiaryRevocableQuestion: Do you want this beneficiary to be revocable? (optional)

beneficiariesDuplicateError.expected: You can't add this person as a contingent beneficiary because you've already added them as a primary beneficiary with the same first name, last name and relationship to you.

contingentBeneficiaryPO.beneficiariesDuplicateError: You've already added a contingent beneficiary with the same first name, last name and relationship to you.
contingentBeneficiaryPO.beneficiariesAllocationError: Edit your allocations for contingent beneficiaries so that they add up to 100%.

contingentbeneficiaryTrusteePO.contingentTrusteeQuestion: Does this beneficiary require a trustee?

contingentTrusteeSelectionNo.initial: Select if this beneficiary requires a trustee.

contingentTrusteeRelationship.initial: What's the trustee's relationship to you?

contingentbeneficiaryTrusteePO.contingentTrusteeRelationshipError: Select the trustee's relationship to you.

contingentTrusteeFirstNameInvalid.initial: Enter a valid first name that contains only letters, hyphens, spaces, apostrophes, brackets and periods.

contingentTrusteeLastNameInvalid.initial: Enter a valid last name that contains only letters, hyphens, spaces, apostrophes, brackets and periods.

beneficiariesAdd.expected: The trustee and the beneficiary can't be the same person.
